H0.text: what lands did henry hudson discover. Labrador Coast

H1.text: what lands did henry hudson discover. James Bay

H2.text: what lands did henry hudson discover. Baffin Island

H3.text: what lands did henry hudson discover. Hudson Bay

A4.text: On his final expedition, while still searching for the Northwest Passage, Hudson became the first European to see Hudson Strait and the immense Hudson Bay.

A5.text: In 1611, after wintering on the shore of James Bay, Hudson wanted to press on to the west, but most of his crew mutinied.

A6.text: Hudson worked his way around Greenland's west coast and into the bay, mapping much of its eastern coast.
